sentences.en: After all, the grumbling baby - boomer managers are the same indulgent parents who produced the millennial generation.
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 对新生代员工颇为不满的婴儿潮经理们正是娇惯出新千年一代的父母们.

sentences.en: Boomer professionals like me are destined to find our life choices reduced to marketing archetypes.
sentences.cn: 像我这样婴儿潮时期出生的职业人士注定会发现自己的人生选择简化到广告营销中的模式.

sentences.en: Don't whine about it, or you'll sound like a baby boomer.
sentences.cn: 不要絮叨这些, 不然你想听起来像个婴儿潮时代出生的人.

sentences.en: Especially us baby boomer - participation and all that jazz.
sentences.cn: 特别是我们这些人口激增时期(1946 - 1962)出生的人,热衷于“参与”什么的.

sentences.en: In Boomer that rule finally was disavowed.
sentences.cn: 在“布默”案中,那种规则最后被推翻了.

sentences.en: Some additional facts about Boomer may be helpful in evaluating the case.
sentences.cn: “布默”案中另外的事实或许有助于案例评价.

sentences.en: They created the teenager , the yuppie, the baby boomer, the singleton and the metrosexual.
sentences.cn: 他们把消费者划分为:青少年, 婴儿潮, 单身主义者和都市玉男.

words.tran_cn: 兴旺的，繁荣的；大受欢迎的
兴旺（boom的ing形式）；发出隆隆声

trans.tran_cn: 生育高峰期出生的人，大雄袋鼠
